text: Joe Ansolabehere (born June 18, 1959) is an American live action and animation writer, film and television producer, storyboard artist, screenwriter, director, and producer. He is the co-creator of Recess and Lloyd in Space with partner and friend, Paul Germain. Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American television producers Category:American screenwriters
title: Joe Ansolabehere
